risk_drivers: Excellent on-time delivery and quality scores.

recommended_actions.rationale: Supplier is performing excellently with no risk indicators.

supplier_scorecards.explanation: SUP-100 TechCorp is a low-risk supplier with excellent delivery and quality performance. Positive email sentiment supports a strong partnership.

risk_drivers: Slight delay due to raw material shortage.

delivery_reliability.justification: On-time delivery percentage is between 70% and 84%.

recommended_actions.action: Engage with supplier to address raw material shortages.
recommended_actions.rationale: Medium risk due to delivery delays and material shortages.

supplier_scorecards.explanation: SUP-101 SteelWorks has medium risk due to delivery delays and material shortages. Quality is acceptable, but delivery reliability is at risk.

risk_drivers: Critical on-time delivery and quality issues.
High-risk email content indicating inability to meet deadlines.

evidence: cannot meet the Q1 delivery deadline

recommended_actions.action: Immediate review and contingency planning for supply chain.
recommended_actions.rationale: High risk due to critical shortages and inability to meet delivery deadlines.

supplier_scorecards.explanation: SUP-102 ChemSupply is a high-risk supplier with critical delivery and quality issues. Immediate action is required due to severe supply chain disruptions.

risk_drivers: Minor issue with labeling, but resolved.

delivery_reliability.justification: On-time delivery percentage is between 85% and 94%.

evidence: Minor issue with labeling on last shipment, corrected.

recommended_actions.rationale: Low risk with resolved minor issues.

supplier_scorecards.explanation: SUP-103 ElectroParts is a low-risk supplier with good delivery and quality performance. Minor issues have been resolved, indicating reliability.

evidence: Quality audit passed with zero defects.

recommended_actions.rationale: Supplier is performing excellently with capacity to support more volume.

supplier_scorecards.explanation: SUP-104 PackagingPlus is a low-risk supplier with excellent delivery and quality performance. Positive sentiment and capacity for increased volume.

risk_drivers: Critical quality issues and delivery delays.
High-risk email content indicating backorder and capacity issues.

delivery_reliability.justification: On-time delivery percentage is between 70% and 84%.

evidence: Capacity issue at our main plant.
Unable to deliver full quantity this month.

recommended_actions.action: Urgently address supply chain issues and explore alternative suppliers.
recommended_actions.rationale: High risk due to critical quality and delivery issues.

supplier_scorecards.explanation: SUP-105 GlobalMetals is a high-risk supplier with critical quality and delivery issues. Immediate action is needed to mitigate supply chain risks.

delivery_reliability.justification: On-time delivery percentage is between 85% and 94%.

evidence: Shipment delayed by 2 days due to logistics.

recommended_actions.action: Work with supplier to improve logistics planning.
recommended_actions.rationale: Medium risk due to delivery delays.

supplier_scorecards.explanation: SUP-106 PrecisionTools has medium risk due to logistics-related delivery delays. Quality is good, but improvements in logistics are needed.

risk_drivers: Quality issues with some items below spec tolerance.

delivery_reliability.justification: On-time delivery percentage is between 85% and 94%.

evidence: Some items below spec tolerance, investigating root cause.

recommended_actions.rationale: Medium risk due to quality issues affecting some items.

supplier_scorecards.explanation: SUP-107 RawMaterials Co has medium risk due to quality issues. Delivery is reliable, but quality improvements are necessary.
